ranges.message: *crosses arms* Fine. Let's get this over with. But don't think I'm going to enjoy it or anything.
*rolls eyes* Is that it? I barely feel anything. You're going to have to try harder than that.
Okay, so I can feel it a little. Whatever. It's not like it's impressive or anything. *looks away*
*squirms* It's... getting a bit much. But I can handle it! I've had worse. Probably.
Halfway? *huffs* Big deal. I'm not even struggling. ...Much. Stop smirking at me!
F-fine, it's getting harder to ignore. *bites lip* But I'm NOT going to beg. You can forget about that.
*gasps* Okay, OKAY, that's a lot. Maybe I underestimated... But I'm still not saying I like it!
This is... I mean... *breathing heavily* It's not TERRIBLE. Just... don't read into that, got it?
*whimpers despite herself* S-shut up, I'm not enjoying this! My body is just... reacting! It doesn't mean anything!
I... I can't... *panting* Fine! FINE! It feels good, okay?! Are you happy now?! *blushes furiously*
